job description:
Software Engineer III
The Software Engineer III is responsible for supporting the application development functions of the company in accordance with the policies and practices of EnvisionRxOptions. This position has no direct reports.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Design, develop, maintain and support web applications, web services, APIs, and software modules in support of company operations
  • Lead design and development of complex software components
  • Lead design and development of advanced structured query language (SQL) queries and stored procedures to perform complex database tasks
  • Conduct and participate in peer reviews for designs, code, and other work products
  • Perform software quality assurance, including all types of testing of database designs to confirm functionality and performance
  • Advise management on product and process improvement
  • Analyze application performance and make improvement recommendations
  • Prepare test data and analyze program performance during testing
  • Respond to and resolve severity level one production issues in a timely manner
  • Participate in analysis of information systems problems and the development of applicable solutions
  • Provide coaching, support, and training for less experienced developers
  • Other duties as assigned
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information systems or related field; proven industry experience will be acceptable in lieu of degree
  • A knowledgeable individual with appropriate industry experience, preferably in the healthcare, insurance or PBM industry
  • Minimum of 7 years of experience in application development and/or tech lead capacity
  • High proficient development skills in the following: C++, C#, ASP, ASP.Net, HTML, JavaScript, Visual Studio, and SQL
  • Thorough knowledge of database technology, preferably SQL Server or Oracle
  • Strong object-oriented design and development skills, thorough understanding of design patterns and other object-oriented design best practices
  • Demonstrated experience with automated unit testing practices
  • Comprehensive understanding of agile software development methodology and industry best practices
  • Deep understanding of fundamental software engineering and computer science principles: object-oriented design, structured design, databases, algorithms, data structures, usability, refactoring, debugging, and configuration management
  • Demonstrated aptitude for learning new technologies
  • An intelligent and articulate individual who can relate to people at all levels of an organization and possesses excellent communication skills
  • Effective verbal and written communication skills
  • Strong data analysis and presentation skills
  • Demonstrated ability to independently identify, research, troubleshoot, and resolve issues
  • Sound technical skills, analytical ability, good judgment, and strong operational focus
  • Demonstrated ability to coach others, explain complex concepts in a clear way, and provide technical leadership
  • A well organized, detail-oriented individual who is able to work with peers in a team environment with appropriate guidance and supervision
  • Capability to efficiently complete tasks in a fast paced environment
  • Demonstrated ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines
  • Ability to work extended hours, weekends, and holidays pursuant with company or industry demands
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office and industry related software programs
WORK ENVIRONMENT:
Includes a typical office environment, with minimal exposure to excessive noise or adverse environmental issues.

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS:
Ability to sit for prolonged periods of time.

Pre-employment drug screening and background checks are required. The company offers a competitive salary and benefits package. EOE. All qualified applicants receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability or veteran status.
EnvisionRxOptions is committed to maintaining a productive, drug-free workplace that keeps employees and customers safe from harm.
